name: Medical Insight
overview:
The EasyViz Enterprise system revolutionizes the way in which clinicians gain access to patient data and improves nomadic clinical workflows in the healthcare industry.

EasyViz is based on server-side computing and adaptive streaming. EasyViz ensures clinical staff can provide a high level of patient care, regardless of their location and without compromising workflow, functionality or image quality. EasyViz is currently making a difference in a number of renowned healthcare facilities across Europe and the USA, each with unique IT environments. EasyViz is developed and distributed by Medical Insight, an innovative software development company founded in 2001. It has headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark and in Chicago, USA.
